overview: Dr Melissa Stereo (Cassi Maddox) races to find the cure to a new disease that is starting to slowly affect life in the southern United States. Along with her husband Nelson (DJames Jones) and son Emile (Gaven Wilde) They race to stop a crisis before it starts. But with the disease's origins looming in the government and Melissa suffering from extreme anxiety that may be easier said then done.
title: Testing
